title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.1 - Traffic to comply with signals, directives and signs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.1 - Traffic to comply with signals, directives and signs

State Regulations

All traffic in or upon a public vehicular parking area, operational area, fuel storage area, public landing area, public ramp and apron
area, public passenger ramp and apron area, public cargo ramp and apron area or
public aircraft parking and storage areas must at all times comply with any
lawful order, signal or direction of any authorized Port Authority
representative. Where such traffic is controlled by traffic lights, signs, mechanical or electrical signals, or pavement markings, such lights, signs, signals and markings shall be obeyed unless an authorized Port Authority
representative directs otherwise. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1262.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
